Web Design

Updating the 'Jardin de France' brand

The houston-based antique importers are ready for a new website

3 June 2015

The original Jardin de France mark we made about a month ago has been great for their business cards. Now though, it's time to address their current website.

Their new store front is up and running, and with great success! With the traffic they are getting, we decided now is the right time to update their online presence and brand. You can see the direction we're going with it in this sample of their new Facebook cover image. If you would like to see how the site currently looks, you can visit their website.

Site Link | www.JardinDeFranceTX.com

If you are interested in having a bespoke website created, contact the Studio N Creations team and get started today.
